reviewText: The Amazing Johnathan is a hilarious guy. He's one of the top comedy magicians in the world today, and this special highlights why. Keep in mind this isn't for everyone though. One of his trademarks is the ability to find creative ways to give someone the finger, and he does so many times throughout.While this can't be described as family entertainment by any means, it IS a pretty funny way to spend an hour. His original Comedy Central Presents appearance is included here and though there are a few similar moments, there's enough new stuff to make it worth watching.I would have liked to have seen this cleaned up a bit so everyone could enjoy it, but at least it's out there. This show is almost exactly what aired on CC earlier this year. The "Uncensored" parts are mostly concerning not blurring out the finger and a couple of different props that weren't seen on the special.Not recommended for the family, but if you know what you're getting into it's funny. A little gross sometimes (the razor blade trick, for instance), but overall good.

reviewText: Super funny guy, I saw him on tv one time so I searched him up. His youtube videos were hysterical. If you watch his youtube videos, buy the dvd. This is all new material and its hilarious!

reviewText: funny how many people still do not know who he is, butt for those that have enjoyed his performances know how good he is, he is now a regular in vegas & rightfully so, he's original & oh so funny, he does do comedy butt also includes clever slight of hand tricks & he just gets better time after time, for those who love him you will not be disappointed & for newcomers to his style you are in for a pleasant surprise
